Chad,

Hmm this is a glaring oversight on my part... :)

It just occured to me that the result of calculating a cross product 
contains negative numbers, but the activation function I am using here 
(steepened sigmoid) outputs over the range 0.0 to 1.0. So in order to 
get negative answers I need to either shift and scale the answer to the 
range -1.0 to 1.0, or use a different activation function.  Are you 
manipulating your network's answers at all, if not then maybe give that 
a go.

Colin
